name: BEST NFT EVER - Genesis Drop
description:
TL;DR: We are the BEST NFT EVER - Join us!


This is our Genesis Drop! Everyone who collects and hold 1 Edition will receive the following for as long as ownership of our Genesis Drop lasts:


- 50% of the Tezos that BEST NFT EVER generates from all primary sales of NFTs that BEST NFT EVER drops in the future (collaboratively or alone), equally distributed among all owners of the BEST NFT EVER Genesis Drop.


- 50% of the Tezos that BEST NFT EVER generates as royalties from all secondary sales of NFTs that BEST NFT EVER drops in the future (collaboratively or alone), equally distributed among all owners of the BEST NFT EVER Genesis Drop.


- 50% randomly allocated NFTs from Artists/Projects BEST NFT EVER collects from as giveaways. We usually buy more than one edition, if more than one edition is available.


- 50% of the Tezos that BEST NFT EVER earns from trading NFTs that BEST NFT EVER collected, equally distributed among all owners of the BEST NFT EVER Genesis Drop.


Follow BEST NFT EVER on socials and join the Discord for future adjustments of this list and major announcements on everything we can, because we are the BEST NFT EVER!
